description: This file defines interfaces for the ssp_messagebus component, including function declarations for engaging, initializing, finalizing, checking bus status, and freeing resources. It serves as an interface header for message bus interactions within the system.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages the message bus for a specified component, using the provided component ID, configuration file, and path.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the message bus interface with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes and cleans up the message bus interface with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Checks the status of the message bus interface with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources associated with the message bus for a given priority and user data.
